resources.string:
Welcome to the Scrunch Time app! For quick reference, here is the meaning of each scrunchie color. 

Red: Do not disturb 

Purple: Knock first 

Blue: Neutral 

Green: Feeling social 

Yellow: Friends in dorm
Scrunch time was developed to facilitate roommate communication. By selecting the color that best represents your mood, you can quickly and easily share that information with your roommate.
